entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as a character who has been affected by the contamination. He is described as losing control and collapsing into a chair beside Bill's bed.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as having fought maniacs on Dumbledore's orders and being in a state that requires attention from Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who might know something to help Bill, but is also dead.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as suggesting that Dumbledore might know something to help Bill and that he owes Dumbledore a debt of gratitude.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as delivering the news that Dumbledore is dead.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as not contradicting Ginny's statement about Dumbledore being dead and feeling like he is intruding upon something private when Lupin loses control.

relationships.description: Lupin is concerned about Bill's state and collapses into a chair beside his bed.
Ron suggests that Dumbledore owes him a debt of gratitude for fighting maniacs on his orders.
Ginny informs Ron and others about Dumbledore's death.
